question: Which companies that recently raised capital have also increased the adoption of AI technologies in their tech stack?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that have recently raised capital from the CompanyDealMaster table. [CompanyDealMaster]
Filter those companies to find their tech stack details focusing on AI technologies. [CompanyTechStack]
Gather general information about the identified companies from the CompanyInfo table. [CompanyInfo]
Combine the data to identify companies that meet both criteria. [CompanyDealMaster, CompanyTechStack, CompanyInfo]
